LocaleLayout.description: This is a simple example of a multi-language website. We are using the next-intl library to manage the translations in union with authjs for authentication.

HomePage.info: Please navigate to the login page and login to show Github profile information!

tags.1: This is a simple way to integrate next-intl and auhtjs (formerly known as next-auth) into Nextjs.
tags.2: Please note that the current next-intl documentation and examples are for next-auth version 4, hence the need to have this tutorial at hand.
tags.3: Be sure to consult the official documentation of both libraries.
